TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCachePolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含可用于设置特定于缓存的 HTTP 标头以及用于控制 ASP.NET 页输出缓存的方法。

span.span: Contains methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 HTTP 标头和控制缓存的背景信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For background information about HTTP headers and controlling caching, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddValidationCallback (System.Web.HttpCacheValidateHandler handler, object data);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddValidationCallback(class System.Web.HttpCacheValidateHandler handler, object data) cil managed
Public Sub AddValidationCallback (handler As HttpCacheValidateHandler, data As Object)

span.span: The value.

param.name: data
param.span: 传递回 委托的用户提供的任意数据。

span.span: The arbitrary user-supplied data that is passed back to the delegate.

summary.span: 注册当前响应的验证回调。

span.span: Registers a validation callback for the current response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种机制，用于在输出缓存将响应返回到客户端之前，在缓存中以编程方式检查响应。The method provides a mechanism to check the response programmatically in the cache before the response is returned to the client by the output cache. 在从 Web 服务器缓存提供响应之前，将查询所有已注册的处理程序，以确保资源有效性。Before the response is served from the Web server cache, all registered handlers are queried to ensure resource validity. 如果任何处理程序设置了指示缓存的响应无效的标志，则该项将被标记为无效，并从缓存中 expelled。If any handler sets a flag indicating that the cached response is not valid, the entry is marked as not valid and expelled from the cache. 在这种情况下，以及当任何处理程序指示应忽略此请求的缓存响应时，该请求将被当作缓存未命中处理。In this case, as well as when any handler indicates that the cached response should be ignored for this request, the request is then handled as if it were a cache miss. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加委托以根据查询字符串值验证请求。The following code example demonstrates how to add a delegate to validate a request based on query string values. [!code-aspx-csharp[Cache Validation Callback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache validation callback/CS/ValidationCallbackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Cache Validation Callback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache validation callback/VB/ValidationCallbackvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendCacheExtension(string extension) cil managed

param.name: extension
param.span: 要追加到 标头的文本。

span.span: The text to append to the header.

summary.span: 指定将文本追加到 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Appends the specified text to the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果浏览器无法识别缓存控制指令或扩展，则浏览器必须忽略无法识别的字词。If the browser does not recognize cache control directives or extensions, the browser must ignore the unrecognized terms. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 Internet Explorer 支持的缓存控制扩展。The following code example demonstrates the use of a cache-control extension supported by Internet Explorer. 服务器向浏览器指明内容不会更改一小时 (`pre-check=3600`) 并指示它直接从本地缓存中检索内容。The server is indicating to the browser that the content will not change for one hour (`pre-check=3600`) and instructs it to retrieve the content directly from the local cache. 但是，如果内容是由服务器修改的，并且用户在15分钟 (`post-check= 900`) 到一小时的时间段内请求页面，则浏览器将显示本地缓存中找到的信息，同时还会在服务器上执行背景检查和可选提取。However, if the content is modified by the server and the page is requested by the user within a fifteen-minute (`post-check= 900`) to one-hour period, the browser displays the information found in the local cache but also performs a background check and optional fetch of the new content on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory(bool allow) cil managed

param.name: allow
param.span: 指示客户端浏览器将响应存储在“历史记录”文件夹中，否则为 。

span.span: to direct the client browser to store responses in the History folder; otherwise .
The default is .

summary.span: 当 参数为 时，将使响应在客户端浏览器“历史记录”缓存中可用，而不论服务器上所做的 设置是什么。

span.span: Makes the response is available in the client browser History cache, regardless of the setting made on the server, when the parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 设置为 或 `Expires` HTTP 标头默认设置为-1 时，这将告知客户端不在历史记录文件夹中缓存响应，因此，当你使用后退/前进按钮时，客户端每次都请求响应的新版本。When is set to or the `Expires` HTTP header is by default set to -1; this tells the client not to cache responses in the History folder, so that when you use the back/forward buttons the client requests a new version of the response each time. 您可以通过 在 `allow` 参数设置为的情况下调用方法来重写此行为 `true` 。You can override this behavior by calling the method with the `allow` parameter set to `true`. 如果 设置为或以外的值 ，则 用的任一值调用方法 `allow` 不起作用。If is set to values other than or , calling the method with either value for `allow` has no effect. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以指示客户端将响应存储在自定义的的历史记录中 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to direct the client to store the responses in its history in a custom . [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory/CS/httpcachepolicy_setallowresponseinbrowserhistorycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory/VB/httpcachepolicy_setallowresponseinbrowserhistoryvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

summary.span: HTTP 标头控制在网络上缓存文档的方式。

span.span: The HTTP header controls how documents are to be cached on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 `Cache-Control` 标头设置为的枚举值 `no-cache` 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control` header to the enumerated value for `no-cache`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 标头设置为 值之一，并将扩展追加到指令。

span.span: Sets the header to one of the values of and appends an extension to the directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当与或指令一起使用时，字段名称扩展才有效 `private` `no-cache` 。The field name extension is valid only when used with the `private` or `no-cache` directives. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 如果组合不兼容的指令和扩展，此方法将引发无效的参数异常。This method will throw an invalid argument exception if incompatible directives and extensions are combined. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 `Cache-Control` 将标头设置为枚举值 `private` 并添加缓存控制扩展。The following code example demonstrates how the `Cache-Control` header is set to the enumeration value `private` and adds a cache-control extension. 修改后的指令意味着除任何非共享缓存外，任何仅由名为 "DEV" 的团体的成员共享的缓存可能会缓存响应。The modified directive means that in addition to any non-shared cache, any cache shared only by members of the community named "DEV" may cache the response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetETag(string etag) cil managed

param.name: etag
param.span: 要用于 标头的文本。

span.span: The text to use for the header.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 标头设置为指定的字符串。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ETag`标头是特定文档版本的唯一标识符。The `ETag` header is a unique identifier for a specific version of a document. 客户端使用它来验证客户端缓存的内容，以避免再次请求。It is used by clients to validate client-cached content to avoid requesting it again. `ETag`设置标头后，后续尝试设置它将失败并引发异常。Once an `ETag` header is set, subsequent attempts to set it fail and an exception is thrown. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 `ETag` 标头设置为自定义值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `ETag` header to a custom value. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The header has already been set.
-or-
The has already been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetETagFromFileDependencies() cil managed

summary.span: 基于处理程序的文件依赖项的时间戳设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header based on the time stamps of the handler's file dependencies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 `ETag` 通过检索处理程序所依赖的所有文件的上次修改时间戳来设置标头，将所有文件名和时间戳合并为一个字符串，然后将该字符串哈希转换为用作的单个摘要 `ETag` 。The method sets the `ETag` header by retrieving the last modified time stamps of all files on which the handler is dependent, combining all file names and time stamps into a single string, then hashing that string into a single digest that is used as the `ETag`. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 `ETag` 标头。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `ETag` header. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The header has already been set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetExpires(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed

param.name: date
param.span: 将 标头设置为的绝对 值。

span.span: The absolute value to set the header to.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 标头设置为绝对日期和时间。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to an absolute date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果到期日期违反增长顺序原则，此方法将失败。This method will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将过期时间设置为 6:00 P.M.。The following code example demonstrates how to set the expiration time to 6:00 P.M. 当前到期日的本地时间。local time on the current expiration day. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetLastModified(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed

span.span: The new value for the header.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 标头设置为提供的 值。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to the value supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Last-Modified`HTTP 标头时间将文档标记为 `DateTime` 指示文档上次修改时间的值。The `Last-Modified` HTTP header time stamps the document with the `DateTime` value indicating when the document was last modified. 如果违反了缓存增长顺序层次结构，则此方法将失败。This method will fail if the caching restrictiveness hierarchy is violated. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将标题设置 `Last-Modified` 为新日期。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Last-Modified` header to a new date. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is later than the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 `Last-Modified` 使用方法设置标头 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Last-Modified` header using the method. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetMaxAge(valuetype System.TimeSpan delta) cil managed

param.name: delta
param.span: 用于设置 - 标头的时间跨度。

span.span: The time span used to set the - header.

summary.span: 基于指定的时间跨度设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header based on the specified time span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Max-age` 文档在被视为过时之前允许存在的最大绝对时间。`Max-age` is the maximum absolute time a document is allowed to exist before being considered stale. 此 方法不使用可调过期，如果到期日期违反增长顺序原则，则会失败。The method does not use sliding expiration and will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). > [!NOTE] > 如果 重复调用方法，则在第二个和后续调用中，最大年龄的值仅可以减少。If the method is called repeatedly, on the second and subsequent calls, the value of the maximum age can only be decreased. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 `Cache-Control: max-age` 标头设置为0小时、30分钟和0秒。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control: max-age` header to 0 hours, 30 minutes, and 0 seconds. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than one year.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoServerCaching() cil managed

summary.span: 停止针对当前响应的所有源服务器缓存。

span.span: Stops all origin-server caching for the current response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显式拒绝在源服务器上缓存文档。Explicitly denies caching of the document on the origin-server. 设置后，对该文档的所有请求都将被完全处理。Once set, all requests for the document are fully processed. 调用此方法时，无法为当前响应重新启用缓存。When this method is invoked, caching cannot be re-enabled for the current response. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为响应的其余部分禁用输出缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to disable output caching for the remainder of the response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoStore() cil managed

summary.span: 设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的 方法 来指示客户端不在其历史记录中存储响应。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method of the class to direct the client not to store the responses in its history. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicySetNoStore#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetNoStore/CS/httpcachepolicy_setnostorecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicySetNoStore#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetNoStore/VB/httpcachepolicy_setnostorevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoTransforms() cil managed

summary.span: 设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Cache-Control: no-transform`HTTP 标头指示网络缓存应用程序不修改文档。The `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header instructs network caching applications not to modify the document. `Cache-Control: no-transform`HTTP 标头可防止下游代理服务器更改由、或标头指定的任何标头值 `Content-Encoding` `Content-Range` `Content-Type` (这包括实体主体) 。The `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header prevents downstream proxy servers from changing any header values specified by the `Content-Encoding`, `Content-Range`, or `Content-Type` headers (this includes the entity body). 例如，它可防止代理将 GIF 图像转换为 PNG。For example, it prevents proxies from converting GIF images to PNG. 与对缓存的其他限制一样， 调用后， `Cache-Control: no-transform` 不能通过接口禁用 HTTP 标头 。As with other restrictions on caching, once is called, the `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header cannot be disabled through the interface. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 `Cache-Control: no-transform` 指令与当前响应一起发送。The following code example demonstrates how to send the `Cache-Control: no-transform` directive with the current response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetOmitVaryStar(bool omit) cil managed

param.name: omit
param.span: 若要指示 不对其 属性使用 \* 值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to direct the to not use the \* value for its property; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指定在按参数进行区分时，响应是否应该包含 标头。

span.span: Specifies whether the response should contain the header when varying by parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许你在 `vary:*` 缓存的响应随参数变化时防止输出 ached 将标头添加到传出响应。This method allows you to prevent the output ached from adding a `vary:*` header to the outgoing response when the cached response varies by parameter. 这对于不同于查询字符串的缓存的客户端很有用，因为大多数客户端将根据查询字符串自动改变，无需 `vary:*` 标头。This is useful for clients varying caching by query string because most clients will automatically vary by query string without requiring the `vary:*` header. > [!NOTE] > 使用 `vary:*` 标头可禁用所有客户端缓存。The use of the `vary:*` header can disable all client caching. 这是一种对属性有影响的便利方法 。This is a convenience method to affect the property. 传递 `true` 给方法会指示 忽略属性的 \* 值 。Passing `true` to the method directs the to ignore the \* value for the property. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法不使用可调过期，如果到期日期违反增长顺序原则，则会失败。The method does not use sliding expiration and will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 `Cache-Control: s-maxage` 标头设置为0小时、30分钟和0秒。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control: s-maxage` header to 0 hours, 30 minutes, and 0 seconds. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值（等效于 ）是在标头中发送两条指令，除非此方法显式指定。The default, which is equivalent to , is to send neither directive in a header unless explicitly specified by this method. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将缓存重新验证设置为 。The following code example demonstrates how to set cache revalidation to . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSlidingExpiration(bool slide) cil managed

span.span: or .

summary.span: 将缓存过期从绝对时间设置为可调时间。

span.span: Sets cache expiration to from absolute to sliding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 "缓存过期" 设置为 "滑动"，则 `Cache-Control` 会随每个响应一起续订 HTTP 标头。When cache expiration is set to sliding, the `Cache-Control` HTTP header will be renewed with each response. 此过期模式与 IIS 配置选项相同，可将过期标头添加到相对于当前时间的所有输出集。This expiration mode is identical to the IIS configuration option to add an expiration header to all output set relative to the current time. 如果你将 "可调过期" 显式设置为 `false` "关闭" () ，则会保留该设置，并且任何启用可调过期的尝试都将失败。If you explicitly set sliding expiration to off (`false`), that setting will be preserved and any attempts to enable sliding expiration will silently fail. 此方法不会直接映射到 HTTP 标头。This method does not directly map to an HTTP header. 后面的模块或辅助角色请求使用它来设置源服务器缓存策略。It is used by subsequent modules or worker requests to set origin-server cache policy. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将可调过期设置为 `true` 。The following code example demonstrates how to set sliding expiration to `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetValidUntilExpires(bool validUntilExpires) cil managed

param.name: validUntilExpires
param.span: 如果缓存忽略 无效标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cache ignores invalidation headers; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 缓存是否应忽略客户端发送的使缓存失效的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Specifies whether the ASP.NET cache should ignore HTTP headers sent by the client that invalidate the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 使用高级页面指令时，方法会自动设置为 `<%@ OutputCache … %>` 。The method is set to `true` automatically when the high-level `<%@ OutputCache … %>` page directive is used. 提供此方法是因为某些浏览器在刷新页面视图时，将 HTTP 缓存失效标头发送到 Web 服务器，并从缓存中逐出该页。This method is provided because some browsers, when refreshing a page view, send HTTP cache invalidation headers to the Web server and evict the page from the cache. 当 `validUntilExpires` 参数为时 `true` ，ASP.NET 将忽略缓存失效标头，页面将保留在缓存中，直到它过期。When the `validUntilExpires` parameter is `true`, ASP.NET ignores cache invalidation headers and the page remains in the cache until it expires. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来指示忽略客户端发送的任何缓存失效标头。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to instruct that any cache invalidation headers sent by the client are ignored. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires/CS/httpcachepolicy_setvaliduntilexpirescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires/VB/httpcachepolicy_setvaliduntilexpiresvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVaryByCustom(string custom) cil managed

param.name: custom
param.span: 用于改变已缓存的输出的文本字符串。

span.span: The text string to vary cached output by.

summary.span: 指定自定义文本字符串，它用于改变已缓存的输出响应。

span.span: Specifies a custom text string to vary cached output responses by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将自定义变化字符串设置为 "Accept-字符集"，这会导致源服务器的缓存根据浏览器的标头选择多个缓存的响应之一 `Accept-Charset` 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the custom vary string to "Accept-Charset", which causes the origin-server's cache to choose one of several cached responses depending on the browser's `Accept-Charset` header. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByContentEncodings As HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取用于区分输出缓存的 标头列表。

span.span: Gets the list of headers that will be used to vary the output cache.

value.span: 指定将用于选择缓存的响应的 标头对象。

span.span: An object that specifies which headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回内容编码标头的列表，这些标头表示用于改变输出缓存的压缩方案。The property returns a list of Content-Encoding headers that represent compression schemes to vary the output cache by. 缓存动态压缩的响应意味着在第一次请求资源时，压缩开销只引发一次。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource. 属性与 `Accept-Encoding` 请求标头一起使用，以确定如何为动态压缩的不同内容编码提供缓存的响应。The property is used with the `Accept-Encoding` header of a request to determine how to serve cached responses for different content encodings that are dynamically compressed. 接受编码标头列出了客户端可以解压缩的编码。The Accept-Encoding header lists the encodings that the client can decompress. 当你将缓存设置为随内容编码而变化时，它会让响应间接地按标头中的值进行变化 `Accept-Encoding` 。When you set the cache to vary by content encoding, it lets the response vary indirectly by the value in the `Accept-Encoding` header. 处理请求时，将 `Accept-Encoding` 检查标头并标识第一个可接受的编码，并将其用于执行以下操作之一：When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果在列表中找到匹配的编码， 并且存在缓存的响应，则发送缓存的响应。If a matching encoding is found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果在列表中找到了匹配的编码 ，但缓存的响应不存在，则将生成响应并将其插入缓存中。If a matching encoding is found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果在列表中找不到匹配的编码 ，则会搜索缓存的非编码响应，也称为 "标识响应"。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到非编码响应，则发送。If the non-encoded response is found, it is sent. 否则，将生成并发送新的非编码响应，并将其存储在缓存中。Otherwise, a new non-encoded response is generated, sent, and stored in the cache. 有关属性的详细信息 ，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上提供的 "RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1"。For more information about the property, see "RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1," which is available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关内容编码的信息位于第14部分 "标头字段定义"。Information about content encodings is in section 14, "Header Field Definitions." 您可以 使用 `VaryByContentEncodings` [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) 指令的属性来设置属性。You can set the property by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) directive. 你还可以将缓存配置文件添加到 Web.config 文件中的 [outputCacheProfile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228244(v=vs.100)) 元素。You can also add a cache profile to the [outputCacheProfile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228244(v=vs.100)) element in the Web.config file. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为要从输出缓存提供的页启用动态压缩响应。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response for a page to be served from the output cache. 可接受的编码为 "gzip"，并使用 `VaryByContentEncodings` [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) 指令的属性进行设置。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) directive. 如果承载页面的 Web 服务器未启用动态压缩，则输出缓存将不包含基于指定内容编码的缓存响应。If the Web server that is hosting the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response that is based on the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByHeaders As HttpCacheVaryByHeaders
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByHeaders ^ VaryByHeaders { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByHeaders ^ get(); };

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取将用于改变缓存输出的所有 HTTP 标头的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of all HTTP headers that will be used to vary cache output.

value.span: 一个 ，它指定用于选择缓存响应的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: An that specifies which HTTP headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缓存项具有多个 vary 标头，则会在每个 HTTP 标头类型的缓存中提供请求文档的单独版本。When a cached item has several vary headers, a separate version of the requested document is available from the cache for each HTTP header type. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByParams As HttpCacheVaryByParams
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ VaryByParams { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取由影响缓存的 HTTP 或 HTTP 接收的参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters received by an HTTP or HTTP that affect caching.

value.span: 一个 ，它指定用于选择缓存响应的缓存控制标头。

span.span: An that specifies which cache-control headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于集合中的每个命名参数，都可以从缓存中获取请求文档的单独版本 。A separate version of the requested document is available from the cache for each named parameter in the collection. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).
